snippet.title: Escape Academy - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to ESCAPE ACADEMY! Your training to become the ultimate escapist begins NOW. Play alone in single player OR through two player co-operative play. 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812090/Escape_Academy/

Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/escape-academy/9p3nt9h51rmr

PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004502/

Epic Games: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/escape-academy-bfc2bf
